page.title: 12FARMS AROUND CRANTOCK
page.content: There are 3 farms in our area and all have Camping facilities. {Treago Farm grows mainly corn which is stored in corn bins. These are large cylinders made of metal about 8 metres high and 5 metres wide.{Trevella Farm}and {Penpol}are both dairy farms and keep cows and bulls. The size of a farm is measured in acres and we found out that Trevella is 460 acres. All 3 farms have proper Cornish hedges which separate the fields. These high hedges are made of stone and earth, topped with turf and are wider at the base than at the top. Many of them have stood for centuries. Machines are common on these farms; corn driers, corn crushers and tractors which are used for pulling and power- ing machinery and general transport around the farm.
